body.p: We the undersigned are acquainted with Michael B Johnson and know that he has been unfortunate in his business and would Cheerfully recommend his petition to the clemency of her excellency Govenour Magoffin in the remission of said fine

C D Carr
L. P. Young
Jno C. Hansbro.
Ed G. Duncanson J S
Jno B Norton
